parameters.name: ChainConfig
parameters.description: The configuration of the delivery chain in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ChainId
parameters.description: The ID of the delivery chain.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the delivery chain.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the delivery chain.

parameters.name: ScopeExclude
parameters.description: Repositories in which the delivery chain does not take effect.
